name: Fupa.Net Widget Shortcode
author: Darius BrÃ¼ckers

sections.description:
This plugin allows the user to easily embed Fupa.net-Widgets to their content.

The only thing to do, is to simply add the Shortcode in the page (or post etc.) by hand or via the WYSIWYG-Editor.

The Shortcode-Format is
[fupanet id=”{Widget ID}” header=”{1/0}” navi=”{1/0}” show=”{team/statistik/spielplan/tabelle/torschuetzen/archiv}”]

or simply
[fupanet id=”{Widget ID}”]
sections.installation:
• Unzip the File
  • Upload fupanet-widget-includer/-folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  • Use the football-button in the editor or just typewrite the shortcode

The Shortcode-Format is
[fupanet id=”{Widget ID}” header=”{1/0}” navi=”{1/0}” show=”{team/statistik/spielplan/tabelle/torschuetzen/archiv}”]

or simply
[fupanet id=”{Widget ID}”]

short_description: Allows people to embed Fupa.net-Widgets as Shortcode with the WYSIWYG-Editor.
